author: protolambda
content:
Terminated last few of my zinken nodes, and the eth2stats, etc. We are right around the corner of a v1.0.0 devnet, then larger public but dev-controlled ones follow after.

For now I would recommend helping find clients issues on medalla, and then later test your setup when we open up a longer devnet. We plan to maintain more nodes there, so it can withstand the inevitable higher validator online/offline fluctuations of mainnet launch prep.

author: djrtwo
content: moving zinken to the graveyard. Speak now or forever hold your peace

author: protolambda
content:
https://m.interglot.com/nl/en/zinken
Zinken held up surprisingly well, the name was the opposite to me. Bye zinken
